info.description: This is the API documentation for KetukApps backend service.
info.title: KetukApps API

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token

get.description: Get the currently authenticated user's information

post.description: Get a new access token using refresh token

get.description: Get a list of all item categories
Get an item category by its ID

put.description: Update item category information by ID

delete.description: Delete an item category by ID

get.description: Get a list of all items
Get all items for a specific category
Get an item by its ID
Get a list of all tickets

post.description: Create a new ticket for a user

get.description: Get a ticket by its ID

patch.description: Update the status of a ticket

get.description: Get a list of all users

post.description: Create a new user with name and email

get.description: Get a user by their ID
Check if the API is running

models.CreateTicketRequest.description: Request body for creating a new ticket

description.example: Need to book conference room for meeting

models.CreateUserRequest.description: Request body for creating a new user

models.RefreshTokenRequest.description: Request body for refreshing access token

models.UpdateTicketRequest.description: Request body for updating a ticket

models.UpdateUserRequest.description: Request body for updating user information

google_sub.description: GoogleSub is kept for backwards compatibility with existing data
